episode_summary: In this episode, Kim Rittberg discusses the critical role of 'About Me' videos in building a personal brand for real estate agents. She introduces the ABC method—Accomplishments, Business focus, and Confidence/Creativity—as a framework for creating compelling video content. Kim also highlights the importance of investing in professional video production to effectively showcase an agent's personality and credibility.
